metadata.title: We Will Miss You Party Farewell Decorations Set, Going Away Party Decorations Includes Miss You Backdrop Banner, Miss You Table Covers and Multicolor Balloons for Anniversary Retirement (Gold)
features: What you get: package include 1 piece we will miss you banner, 2 pieces miss you rectangle table cloth, printed with stars and 50 pcs balloons to cheer your going away party, adding an impressive beauty to the grand party

Wonderful party supplies: this miss you backdrop banner measures 185 x 110 cm/ 72.8 x 43.3 inches and the tablecloth measures 137 x 274 cm/ 54 x 108 inches, 50 pieces confetti balloons, you can use it in anywhere, those are large enough to decorate party, make you and your friends more joyful to enjoy the party

Quality material: the going away banner is made of polyester fabric, lightweight; The wall backdrop can be folded and easy to carry, washable and tear-resistant, and the table cloth is made of quality thick plastic material, lightweight and portable, quality and reliable, waterproof and disposable for easy to clean up, very suitable for your party and any anniversary party decorations

Easy to use: the miss you banner has grommet holes on the 4 corners, you can pass the rope through these holes and fix it to the wall, fence, garage door, window, tree and garden, which will not only catch the eyes of the guests, but also receive endless compliments. What's more, only open the package, put the tablecloth on your table, when party finished just throw out, you don't speed many times to clean

Wide application: this colored table cloth set will add an impressive beauty to the anniversary party, adding an impressive beauty to the grand farewell anniversary retirement graduation going away party, which is an essential decoration to create memorable party atmosphere
description: Features:  Wide colored table cover set will add an impressive beauty to the anniversary party, adding an impressive beauty to the grand farewell anniversary retirement graduation going away party, which is an essential decoration to create memorable party atmosphere. What's more, only open the package, put the tablecloth on your table, when party finished just throw out, you don't speed many times to clean. Please allow slight color difference due to different monitor.
